title: Class 3: Readings
text: 'Artificial Intelligence Applications in Financial Services' Oliver Wyman (Section on 'How is AI Applied in Financial Services?')
'Artificial Intelligence & Financial Services – Fall 2019 Report' Mayer Brown (Section on 'AI and Big Data Regulatory Risks Under Banking and Consumer Financial Laws')
'Fintech: Understanding AI Use in Financial Services' Julie Stackhouse, St. Louis Federal Reserve Bank

title: Class 3: Study Questions
text: How do new forms of AI enabled data analytics, pattern recognition, chatbots, natural language processing, and robotic process automation fit within other emerging FinTech trends?
How has it affected the competitive landscape of financial incumbents, big tech firms and fintech startups?

title: AI and Machine Learning
text: DL - => 2010's => ML with Multi-layer Neural Networks
RL – ML Extracting Features of Data Sets

title: AI and Machine Learning - Finance
text: Call Centers, Chatbots, Robo-Advising & Virtual Assistants
Credit & Insurance - Allocation, Extension, Pricing & Scoring
Regulatory – Anti Money Laundering, Anti Manipulation

title: AI and Machine Learning - Finance
text: Big Finance, Big Tech, & FinTech Disrupters
Cape Analytics (2014) – Insurance Property Risk Analytics
Zesty.ai (2015) – P & C Insurance Risk Analytics

title: AI and Machine Learning - Finance
text: 106M members; 37M Monthly Active Members; 2600+ data points per member; 8 Billion Daily Model Predictions
200+ Million Accounts Linked; 11,000 Financial Cos; 2,600 FinTech Developers
Sources: 'Intuit Acquisition of Credit Karma' Intuit (2/24/20); 'Visa's Acquisition of Plaid', Visa (1/13/20); & 'What's Visa Going To Do With Plaid', Forbes (1/20/20) for Plaid Rev Est.

title: Alternative Data
text: Bank, Checking, Employment, Income, Insurance, Tenant, Utilities
App Usage, Browsing History, Email Receipt, Geolocation, Social Media Data
Educational Background, Employer, Occupation, Work History

title: Apple Credit Card
text: She spoke to two Apple reps.
representing an utterly broken and reprehensible system.
The first person was like “I don’t know why, but I swear we’re not
discriminating, IT'S JUST THE ALGORITHM”. I shit you not.

title: Apple Credit Card
text: I'm a current Apple employee and founder of the company and the same thing happened to us (10x) despite not having any separate assets or accounts. Some say the blame is on Goldman Sachs but the way Apple is attached, they should share responsibility.

title: AI & U.S. Consumer Credit Laws
text: Regulation B on Notices on Actions
Consumer Reporting Agencies and Consumer Reports
Unfair, Deceptive, and Abusive Acts and Practices (UDAAPs) - CFPB
Unfair and Deceptive Acts and Practices (UDAP) - FTC & States

title: AI & Privacy Laws
text: U.S. Federal –FCRA, Gramm Leach Bliley, & Right to Financial Privacy Act
U.S. States – California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)

title: AI, Finance, & Geopolitics
text: Finance is Interconnected Globally and Regulated Locally
Countries’ Financial Sectors Vary in Development, Concentration and Public Sector Involvement
International Organizations (OECD ...) Guidelines generally at High level
Financial Policy Standard Setters (Basal, FATF, IOSCO ..) are Non-Binding
Competing models on AI, Finance & Policy Trade-offs
